divs: Sighting Detailswent to get a few drinks from the shop down the road, on my way back i turned the corner of the road and i could see a very bright orange light in the distance coming from the direction of the local southend airport, my first thought was police helicopter, but they have a white lights so i walked on about 25-- 30 meters as i was walking this orange light just got bigger and bigger and bigger, i stopped walking and hid behind a telegraph pole in the street and just watched in amazement at what was happening to me. This huge orange ball swerved to the left and flew down our road at about 300 ft high, it was bubbling and fiery and pulsing orange, I have never seen fire like this, This was a special kind of fire that i have never seen before, a bit like lather, then flew down in a straight line and did not roll but moved forward like a steady ball, as it went over my head i cupped my hands together to get a better listen but this thing was totally silent as it passed i could see that it was just as round from behind as it was from the front and the underside, this experience has had a profound effect on me for the good, yesterday i told my partner that i was proud to be a human, that is the first time i have ever said that and i have never heard anybody else utter those words. Just in my area alone there have been about 30 sightings on all different days and at different times by all different people
Summary: orange ball the size of a house, 300ft over road glowing and pulsing orange fire
trends: There have been 91 other sightings in London
There were no other sightings in London on or around April 28th 2010
